architecture.description: The CPU architecture of the AMI, such as x86_64 or arm64.

arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the AMI.

block_device_mappings.description: Details about the block device mappings of the AMI.

boot_mode.description: The boot mode of the AMI, such as legacy BIOS or UEFI.

creation_date.description: The date and time when the AMI was created.

deprecation_time.description: The date and time when the AMI will be deprecated.

ena_support.description: Indicates whether enhanced networking with ENA is enabled.

hypervisor.description: The hypervisor type of the AMI, such as xen or nitro.

id.description: The unique identifier of the AMI.

image_location.description: The location of the AMI within Amazon EC2.

image_owner_alias.description: The alias of the owner of the AMI.

image_type.description: The type of the AMI, such as machine or kernel.

imds_support.description: Indicates whether Instance Metadata Service (IMDS) support is enabled.

kernel_id.description: The kernel ID associated with the AMI, if applicable.

owner_id.description: The AWS account ID of the owner of the AMI.

platform.description: The platform of the AMI, such as Windows.

platform_details.description: Additional details about the platform of the AMI.

product_codes.description: The product codes associated with the AMI, if applicable.

public.description: Indicates whether the AMI is publicly available.

ramdisk_id.description: The RAM disk ID associated with the AMI, if applicable.

root_device_name.description: The name of the root device for the AMI instance.

root_device_type.description: The type of root device used by the AMI, such as ebs or instance-store.

root_snapshot_id.description: The snapshot ID of the root device of the AMI.

sriov_net_support.description: Indicates whether enhanced networking with SR-IOV is supported.

state.description: The current state of the AMI, such as available or pending.

state_reason.description: The reason for the current state of the AMI.

tags.description: The tags associated with the AMI.

tpm_support.description: Indicates whether TPM support is enabled for the AMI.

usage_operation.description: The operation associated with the usage of the AMI.

virtualization_type.description: The type of virtualization used by the AMI, such as hvm or paravirtual.
